{{For|the game mode|Adventure}}

[[File:Minecraft x Merlin logo 1.png|thumb|Logo.]]
'''Minecraft Adventure''',<ref>{{citation|url=https://trademarks.justia.com/990/07/minecraft-99007845.html|title=MINECRAFT ADVENTURE - Trademark Details|website=justia.com|date=Janurary 17, 2025}}</ref> also referred to as "'''Adventures Made Real'''", are upcoming theme parks created through a collaboration between [[Mojang Studios]] and {{w|Merlin Entertainments}}.<ref name="announcement">{{citation|url=https://www.merlinentertainments.biz/newsroom/news-releases/2024/merlin-minecraft-in-real-life/|title=Minecraft In Real Life: Merlin Entertainments And Mojang Studios Join Forces To Create Location-Based Attractions|website=merlinentertainments.biz|date=November 19, 2024}}</ref> The collaboration was announced on November 19, 2024 by Merlin Entertainments.<ref>{{tweet|MerlinEntsNews|1858798510981734786|We're teaming up with Mojang Studios and @Minecraft for a global partnership that will see adventures brought to life like never before through immersive and interactive experiences üéÆüëæ<br><br>Are you ready to play? ‚û°Ô∏è merlinentertainments.biz/newsroom/news-‚Ä¶|November 19, 2024}}</ref>

The experience will be launching in the United States and the United Kingdom between 2026 and 2027, and globally eventually.<ref name="announcement" />

== Overview ==
The collaboration will bring ''Minecraft''-themed immersive and interactive entertainment attractions in fixed locations around the globe. This will include digitally enabled real-life experiences, touchpoints that will allow guests to unlock exclusive in-game content, guest accommodations, retail, food & beverage, and attractions, including a ''Minecraft''-themed ride.<ref name="announcement" />
